Scriptal.Name: True Only Once
Scriptal.Description: Returns true if the boolean variable is true, and sets the variable to false. The variable would need to be reset to true in order to fulfill this precondition again.
Scriptal.EventFunctionTemplate: if |[1|BOOLEAN]| then |[1|BOOLEAN]| = false return true end return false

Choice.Name: Boolean Variable
Choice.Description: The custom boolean variable. This will be set to false after the precondition is checked.
